description: This is an ACT managed access requirement used to require that a user has obtained one or more GA4GH Passport Visa Claims in order to access the associated subjects.

conditions.description: The conditions define how this access requirement matches to the expected Passport Visa Claims.  A separate condition is needed for each required field of a claim.  A user's claims must match ALL of the conditions in this list in order for this AR to be considered met.
